meaning.source_meaning: By joining you agree to PLAYERVSPLAYER Rules
meaning.translated_meaning: By joining you agree to PLAYERVSPLAYER Rules

meaning.source_meaning: By joining you agree to PLAYERVSPLAYER Rules
meaning.translated_meaning: By joining you agree to PLAYERVSPLAYER Rules

meaning.source_meaning: You have been kicked out of the round by the host
meaning.translated_meaning: You have been kicked out of the round by the host

txt.content: You have been kicked out of the round by the host

meaning.source_meaning: This room is full. Please, try again later.
meaning.translated_meaning: This room is full. Please, try again later.

txt.content: This room is full. Please, try again later.

meaning.source_meaning: No player activity detected. Refund issued.
meaning.translated_meaning: No player activity detected. Refund issued.

txt.content: No player activity detected. Refund issued.

meaning.source_meaning: Sit out round to continue reading?
meaning.translated_meaning: Sit out round to continue reading?

txt.content: Sit out round to continue reading?

meaning.source_meaning: Doing nothing will automatically close the paytable and begin the round
meaning.translated_meaning: Doing nothing will automatically close the paytable and begin the round

txt.content: Doing nothing will automatically close the paytable and begin the round

meaning.source_meaning: Join one of the rooms above to explore MaxDuel and win!
meaning.translated_meaning: Join one of the rooms above to explore MaxDuel and win!

txt.content: Join one of the rooms above to explore MaxDuel and win!

meaning.source_meaning: Name not available, please try again
meaning.translated_meaning: Name not available, please try again

txt.content: Name not available, please try again

meaning.source_meaning: Make a Deposit to Play this Room
meaning.translated_meaning: Make a Deposit to Play this Room

txt.content: Make a Deposit to Play this Room

meaning.source_meaning: Only weapons earned in a room with the same bet denomination will be shown.
meaning.translated_meaning: Only weapons earned in a room with the same bet denomination will be shown.

txt.content: Only weapons earned in a room with the same bet denomination will be shown.

meaning.source_meaning: The tournament has ended. Please head to the lobby for more MaxDuel tournaments.
meaning.translated_meaning: The tournament has ended. Please head to the lobby for more MaxDuel tournaments.

txt.content: The tournament has ended. Please head to the lobby for more MaxDuel tournaments.

meaning.source_meaning: The tournament has been cancelled. Please head to the lobby for more MaxDuel tournaments.
meaning.translated_meaning: The tournament has been cancelled. Please head to the lobby for more MaxDuel tournaments.

txt.content: The tournament has been cancelled. Please head to the lobby for more MaxDuel tournaments.

meaning.source_meaning: Rebuys limit achieved. Thank you for playing.
meaning.translated_meaning: Rebuys limit achieved. Thank you for playing.

txt.content: Rebuys limit achieved. Thank you for playing.

meaning.source_meaning: Rebuy is not available. Thank you for playing.
meaning.translated_meaning: Rebuy is not available. Thank you for playing.

txt.content: Rebuy is not available. Thank you for playing.

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient tournament balance. You can make a re-buy for $XX.XX. Your new balance will be YY.YY. Make re-buy?
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient tournament balance. You can make a re-buy for $XX.XX. Your new balance will be YY.YY. Make re-buy?

txt.content: Insufficient tournament balance. You can make a re-buy for /REBUY_VALUE/. Your new balance will be /RECHARGE_VALUE/. Make re-buy?

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient tournament balance. You can make free re-buy. Your new balance will be YY.YY. Make re-buy?
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient tournament balance. You can make free re-buy. Your new balance will be YY.YY. Make re-buy?

txt.content: Insufficient tournament balance. You can make free re-buy. Your new balance will be /RECHARGE_VALUE/. Make re-buy?

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient tournament balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient tournament balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet.

txt.content: Insufficient tournament balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet.

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient tournament balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient tournament balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon.

txt.content: Insufficient tournament balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon.

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient funds to play in this room.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient funds to play in this room.

txt.content: Insufficient funds to play in this room.

meaning.source_meaning: Browser error. Please close additional windows and tabs and try again. If the error persists, please contact customer support.
meaning.translated_meaning: Browser error. Please close additional windows and tabs and try again. If the error persists, please contact customer support.

txt.content: Browser error. Please close additional windows and tabs and try again. If the error persists, please contact customer support.

meaning.source_meaning: Unexpected error has occurred, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Unexpected error has occurred, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Unexpected error has occurred, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: You session on website is expired.
meaning.translated_meaning: You session on website is expired.

txt.content: You session on website is expired.

meaning.source_meaning: Server shutdown, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Server shutdown, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Server shutdown, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: Your session has expired, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Your session has expired, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Your session has expired, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: The game was terminated due to extended inactivity. Please start a new game to continue playing.
meaning.translated_meaning: The game was terminated due to extended inactivity. Please start a new game to continue playing.

txt.content: The game was terminated due to extended inactivity. Please start a new game to continue playing.

meaning.source_meaning: Game client is out of date, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Game client is out of date, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Game client is out of date, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: Sorry, an unfinished payment transaction was detected, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: Sorry, an unfinished payment transaction was detected, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: Sorry, an unfinished payment transaction was detected, the game cannot be continued. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: Cannot enter game: Session already in progress. Please close the other session and try again.
meaning.translated_meaning: Cannot enter game: Session already in progress. Please close the other session and try again.

txt.content: Cannot enter game: Session already in progress. Please close the other session and try again.

meaning.source_meaning: This round has been completed. Please go back to lobby and select a new game.
meaning.translated_meaning: This round has been completed. Please go back to lobby and select a new game.

txt.content: This round has been completed. Please go back to lobby and select a new game.

meaning.source_meaning: Oops! It seems like we lost connection. Reconnecting...
meaning.translated_meaning: Oops! It seems like we lost connection. Reconnecting...

txt.content: Oops! It seems like we lost connection. Reconnecting...

meaning.source_meaning: Communicating results to host. Please wait.
meaning.translated_meaning: Communicating results to host. Please wait.

txt.content: Communicating results to host. Please wait.

meaning.source_meaning: Room not found. Please, select another room.
meaning.translated_meaning: Room not found. Please, select another room.

txt.content: Room not found. Please, select another room.

meaning.source_meaning: An error occurred while opening the room. Please, select another room.
meaning.translated_meaning: An error occurred while opening the room. Please, select another room.

txt.content: An error occurred while opening the room. Please, select another room.

meaning.source_meaning: The game unsuccessfully tried to restore connection. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.
meaning.translated_meaning: The game unsuccessfully tried to restore connection. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

txt.content: The game unsuccessfully tried to restore connection. Please try again and contact customer support if the error persists.

meaning.source_meaning: Failed to buy ammo. Please try again.
meaning.translated_meaning: Failed to buy ammo. Please try again.

txt.content: Failed to buy ammo. Please try again.

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

txt.content: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

meaning.source_meaning: Please exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.
meaning.translated_meaning: Please exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.

txt.content: Please exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.

meaning.source_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.
meaning.translated_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.

txt.content: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.

meaning.source_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.
meaning.translated_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.

txt.content: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or exit and re-enter the game to reload your fun money account.

meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient Balance.Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

txt.content: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

meaning.source_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or visit the Vault for more ways to win.
meaning.translated_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or visit the Vault for more ways to win.

txt.content: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or visit the Vault for more ways to win.

meaning.translated_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or visit the Vault for more ways to win.

meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient Balance.Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

txt.content: Insufficient Balance. Please visit the cashier to deposit more funds. Thank you.

meaning.source_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or visit the Vault for more ways to win.
meaning.translated_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or visit the Vault for more ways to win.

txt.content: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or visit the Vault for more ways to win.

meaning.source_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or deposit more into your balance to continue.
meaning.translated_meaning: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or deposit more into your balance to continue.

txt.content: You do not have enough money in your balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or deposit more into your balance to continue.

meaning.source_meaning: You have exceeded your bet amount limit.
meaning.translated_meaning: You have exceeded your bet amount limit.

txt.content: You have exceeded your bet amount limit.

meaning.source_meaning: You are playing in Bonus Mode
meaning.translated_meaning: You are playing in Bonus Mode

txt.content: You are playing in Bonus Mode

meaning.source_meaning: You are playing in Bonus Mode.
meaning.translated_meaning: You are playing in Bonus Mode.

txt.content: You are playing in Bonus Mode.

meaning.source_meaning: Your Bonus has expired – You are now playing in Real Money mode.
meaning.translated_meaning: Your Bonus has expired – You are now playing in Real Money mode.

txt.content: Your Bonus has expired – You are now playing in Real Money mode.

meaning.source_meaning: Your Bonus has been cancelled – You are now playing in Real Money mode.
meaning.translated_meaning: Your Bonus has been cancelled – You are now playing in Real Money mode.

txt.content: Your Bonus has been cancelled – You are now playing in Real Money mode.

meaning.source_meaning: Congratulations, your bonus has been released! Thank you for being a loyal player, enjoy!
meaning.translated_meaning: Congratulations, your bonus has been released! Thank you for being a loyal player, enjoy!

txt.content: Congratulations, your bonus has been released! Thank you for being a loyal player, enjoy!

meaning.translated_meaning: Congratulations, your max bonus of $XX.XX has been released! Thank you for being a loyal player, enjoy!

txt.content: Congratulations, your max bonus of /VALUE/ has been released! Thank you for being a loyal player, enjoy!

meaning.source_meaning: Congratulations, your max bonus of $XX.XX has been released! Thank you for being a loyal player, enjoy! Would you like to continue playing in Real Money mode?
meaning.translated_meaning: Congratulations, your max bonus of $XX.XX has been released! Thank you for being a loyal player, enjoy! Would you like to continue playing in Real Money mode?

txt.content: Your Bonus has been lost. Please, contact customer support if you feel this to be in error.

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient bonus balance. Please contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient bonus balance. Please contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.

txt.content: Insufficient bonus balance. Please contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient bonus balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient bonus balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.

txt.content: Insufficient bonus balance to make a wager at this bet level. Please reduce your bet or contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.

meaning.source_meaning: Insufficient bonus balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.
meaning.translated_meaning: Insufficient bonus balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.

txt.content: Insufficient bonus balance to make a wager with this special weapon. Please choose another weapon or contact customer support if you have any questions or issues.

meaning.source_meaning: Are you sure you wish to leave the room? You may not be able to return to the round in progress if you do.
meaning.translated_meaning: Are you sure you wish to leave the room? You may not be able to return to the round in progress if you do.

txt.content: Are you sure you wish to leave the room? You may not be able to return to the round in progress if you do.

meaning.source_meaning: You got a special weapon! Do you want to use them immediately?
meaning.translated_meaning: You got a special weapon! Do you want to use them immediately?

txt.content: You got a special weapon! Do you want to use them immediately?

meaning.source_meaning: You have been disconnected from the server due to the excessive delay
meaning.translated_meaning: You have been disconnected from the server due to the excessive delay

txt.content: You have been disconnected from the server due to the excessive delay

meaning.source_meaning: You were previously playing in ROOM /ROOM_ID/ with cost of /MIN_VALUE/ - /MAX_VALUE/ per bullet. Would you like to resume your game?
meaning.translated_meaning: You were previously playing in ROOM /ROOM_ID/ with cost of /MIN_VALUE/ - /MAX_VALUE/ per bullet. Would you like to resume your game?

txt.content: You were previously playing in ROOM /ROOM_ID/ with cost of /MIN_VALUE/ - /MAX_VALUE/ per bullet. Would you like to resume your game?

meaning.source_meaning: Please note that selecting NO will forfeit your spot in the game and may result in a loss of future room winnings
meaning.translated_meaning: Please note that selecting NO will forfeit your spot in the game and may result in a loss of future room winnings

txt.content: Please note that selecting NO will forfeit your spot in the game and may result in a loss of future room winnings

txt.content: You are now playing your Free Bonus Round! Enjoy and Good Luck!
